pages.text: $(#0BE334)Item Added In Simply More$(br2)$()The engine hums as smoke expels from the overheating exhaust, a design flaw reminiscent of its prototype status. Revvengine serves as a modified version of one of the Steampunk Societyâ€™s most common tools, the chainsaw; hastily made to aid in the
recent, unexpected war. It was quickly scrapped as newer, better weaponry was blueprinted, but a few experimental models can still be found broken down within the former battlegrounds.
